devdoc.details: Enables swapping through path: TokenA -> TokenB -> TokenC

returns.amounts: Array of output amounts for each step

params.path: Array of token addresses (e.g., [TokenA, TokenB, TokenC])

returns.amounts: Array of amounts for each swap in the path

devdoc.title: DEXRouter

getAmountsOut(uint256,address[]).notice: Get amounts out for a given input through a path

swapExactTokensForTokens(uint256,uint256.notice: Swap exact tokens for tokens through a specified path

userdoc.notice: Router contract for multi-hop swaps through multiple pairs
